example.eg: Measure the weight of these two objects and tell me which one is heavier.
example.egtrans: 称一下这两个物体的重量，然后告诉我哪个重一些。

example.eg: Its weight was sufficient to hold the door open.
example.egtrans: 它的重量足够挡着门了。

example.eg: I try to maintain a healthy weight.
example.egtrans: 我试着保持一个健康的体重。

example.eg: How much weight did you lose after you cut out sugar from your diet?
example.egtrans: 从膳食结构中把糖除去后，你减了多少体重？

example.eg: No matter how much I diet, I can't seem to shift this weight.
example.egtrans: 不管我怎么节食，我似乎都甩不掉这些肥肉。

example.eg: What system of weights and measures do they use in the UK?
example.egtrans: 英国使用什么样的度量衡系统？

example.eg: Old scales used little weights to balance the goods purchased.
example.egtrans: 老式秤用小秤砣来称购买的货物。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 砝码, 秤砣, 秤锤

example.eg: He grabbed the thirty-kilogram weights for his chest exercises.
example.egtrans: 他抓起三十公斤重的哑铃做胸部练习。

example.eg: The weights in this grandfather clock need replacing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （机械装置中的）重体, 钟锤, 压铁

example.eg: The book was used as a weight to hold the door open.
Looking after both elderly parents was a heavy weight on her shoulders.
I don't apply any weight to the age of the candidates.  The best man will get the job.
The priest spoke at the funeral with great weight and respect.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 肃静, 肃穆, 庄重

example.eg: She holds considerable weight in his decision-making.
example.egtrans: 她对他的决策有相当大的影响力。

example.eg: The weight of the majority was so strong that there was no problem passing the legislation.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 力量，影响力, 优势，大部分

example.eg: In the shot put, you have to throw the weight as far as possible.
Mohammad Ali boxed in the heavy weight division.
example.egtrans: 穆罕默德·阿里的拳击重量级别为重量级。

example.eg: The analysis shows that income has considerable weight in who buys expensive cars.
We weighted the sacks before dumping them overboard.
He weighted the papers with the book.
Please don't weight me with all your problems.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给...施加...的压力, 使…有...的负担

example.eg: The numbers were weighted to reflect population density.
The body-mass index is a ratio of a person's body weight to his height.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 沉重的东西, 沉重的静止物

example.eg: With all the problems facing him, Mark felt the weight of the world on his shoulders.
example.egtrans: 面对如此多的问题，马克感到整个世界都压在他的肩上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 感觉到…的重量, 承担...重担

example.eg: Most college students gain weight during their first year of school.  I've put on so much weight, my trousers won't do up!
example.egtrans: 多数大学学生在学习第一年中会长胖。我长胖了好多，裤子都穿不上了！

example.eg: Our lightweight jackets are perfect for travel.
The lightweight match will start at 8 pm.
It's just a lightweight romance novel, but I enjoyed reading it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 轻松的, 无足轻重的

example.eg: The new lightweight looks like serious competition for the champion.

dsense.name: lightweight, light-weight, light weight
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (person who gets drunk quickly) (人)

example.eg: Stumbling after only two beers? You're such a lightweight!
Don't be concerned about his outburst: he's a lightweight.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无足轻重的人, 无关紧要的人

example.eg: If you want to lose weight, eat less and exercise more.
example.egtrans: 如果你想减肥，就少吃多动。

example.eg: The ship carried a net weight of ten thousand tons.

dsense.name: pull your weight, pull your own weight

example.eg: Stuart needs to start pulling his weight on this project if he wants to keep his job.

dsense.name: punch above your weight
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (do more than you are capable of)

example.eg: Really? You've been promoted to head of department? Are you sure you aren't punching above your weight?
Have you seen Jim's new girlfriend? She's gorgeous and she has a PhD; I reckon he's punching above his weight there!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 约会自己配不上的对象

dsense.name: take off weight, take weight off

example.eg: Fred's doctor told him he needed to take off weight.
Charles is a bossy guy who likes throwing his weight around.

dsense.name: watch your weight
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (try not to get fatter)

example.eg: She loves rich food, so she has to be careful and watch her weight.
Weight control is a multi-million pound industry these days.
Her sudden weight loss worried her friends.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重量训练室，健身房，负重训练室

example.eg: He stays in shape by running and doing weight training.

dsense.name: weight-bearing
dsense.guideword: (part: that support a weight or load)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 支撑重量的, 承重的

example.eg: The weightlifter is training for the Olympic Games.
She's taken two medals in weightlifting.
Weightlifting's excellent for improving the strength of your upper body.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 精纺重量, 精纺毛重

example.eg: If you use the internet much, a broadband connection is worth its weight in gold.
